column4: I know this is a little OT byt, Is there a free OS that will run exe.'s without VM windows?
it all depends on what you're trying to install/run.
unity was well tested before launching upon the general community.

I was thinking it might be a viable alternative if someones Os breaks.  I could be like hey, you could run Ubuntu and still run blah blah blah games or whatever.  Or itunes (thats messed up wine to run a mac program)
